title: Feature: Booking Creation with Capacity Validation
body:
Users need to be able to book activities, but the system must prevent overbooking by ensuring that bookings do not exceed the available capacity (maxParticipants). Without booking creation, users cannot reserve spots for activities, and without capacity validation, the system could allow more bookings than available seats, leading to overbooking issues.

**Specification**: [feat-booking-creation.spec.md](specs/feat-booking-creation.spec.md)

**Reference**: [PRD](/PRD.md) FR4, TR1, TR3, TR4.

## Implementation Plan

- **Specification**: [feat-booking-creation.spec.md](specs/feat-booking-creation.spec.md)
- **PRD**: [FR4 Booking Creation with Capacity Validation](PRD.md#fr4-booking-creation-with-capacity-validation)
- **Branch**: feat/booking-creation

steps.title: Step 1: Type Definitions
steps.description: Create TypeScript type definitions for booking domain entities, request DTOs, and validation errors.

tasks.title: Create src/types/booking.ts with Booking, CreateBookingRequest, and ValidationError types
tasks.description: Define domain types for booking entity and request DTOs, including id, activityId, userId, participants, and timestamps

tasks.title: Define Booking interface matching domain requirements with string IDs (not numbers)
tasks.description: Use string IDs to match activity and user ID format (activity-1, user-1, booking-1)

steps.title: Step 2: Booking Service Implementation
steps.description: Implement business logic for booking creation with capacity validation.

tasks.title: Create src/services/booking.service.ts with BookingService class
tasks.description: Implement service with in-memory Map storage for bookings

tasks.title: Implement create method for booking creation with capacity validation
tasks.description: Create bookings with generated ID, validate capacity, set userId from authenticated user, inject ActivityService dependency

tasks.title: Implement getBookingsByActivityId method to retrieve all bookings for an activity
tasks.description: Return array of bookings filtered by activityId for capacity calculation

tasks.title: Implement calculateAvailableCapacity helper method
tasks.description: Calculate available capacity as activity.maxParticipants minus sum of participants from existing bookings

tasks.title: Implement validateCreate method returning ValidationError arrays
tasks.description: Validate required fields (activityId, participants), data types, activity existence, positive participants, and capacity availability

tasks.title: Throw appropriate errors for capacity exceeded, activity not found, and validation failures
tasks.description: Return descriptive error messages for different failure scenarios

steps.title: Step 3: Booking Routes
steps.description: Implement Express routes for booking creation endpoint with authentication middleware.

tasks.title: Create src/routes/bookings.ts with booking endpoints
tasks.description: Register route handlers for booking operations

tasks.title: Implement POST /bookings endpoint with authentication and validation
tasks.description: Create booking, extract userId from JWT token, validate capacity, return booking with HTTP 201

tasks.title: Handle validation errors with HTTP 400, authentication errors with HTTP 401, activity not found with HTTP 404, and capacity exceeded with HTTP 400
tasks.description: Return structured error responses for all error scenarios

steps.title: Step 4: Application Integration
steps.description: Register booking routes in the main Express application with authentication middleware.

tasks.title: Import and register bookings router in src/index.ts
tasks.description: Mount /bookings routes in the Express application

tasks.title: Apply authentication middleware to POST /bookings route
tasks.description: Protect booking creation endpoint with JWT authentication

tasks.title: Verify server starts correctly and endpoints are accessible
tasks.description: Test that the application runs and routes are registered correctly
